about.aboutme: Expeirenced in Test Software Engineer for 3 years, and ond day I found DevOps is very similar that you need to make process automated possible and more interesting, so I started learning fullstack by myself using Dockerize frontend and backend for deveplopment process, finally using CI/CD pipeline to deploy kubernetes on cloud, and setting the domain I purchased
about.education: Yuan Ze University/B.S. in Electrical Engineering  2012-2016

job_list: In charge of new product testing implementation and mantain of notebook and desktop, cooperate with customer and ODMs.
Troubleshooting productuion process issue by analyz log and batch file.
Maintain test software and custom OS image on server.
Automate the entire process to rudece production time and human error.
Writing test SOP to make sure operator's test operation correctly
expeirence.project: Auto checking data on web to replace manual checking
project_list: Using Selenium to manipulate DOM to approch auto checking on web.
Using Pandas filter the needed data on excel, replace manual input.
Auto checking daily and auto sending the result by mail to team member.
Reduce human error, achieve data correctness to 100%.
